subject: Hockey, Ice
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: After allowing a fluky goal in Boston University’s 4-3 loss in the Frozen Four title game, Matt O’Connor was stunned by the outpouring of sympathy he received.
snippet: After allowing a fluky goal in Boston University’s 4-3 loss in the Frozen Four title game, Matt O’Connor was stunned by the outpouring of sympathy he received.
